section.title: Defining a multilingual lexicographic resource
section.para: This defines a lexicographic resource where the source language is Irish and the translation languages are English, German and Czech.

example.title: Pseudocode
example.programlisting: - lexicographicResource (title: My Irish-Multilingual Dictionary, uri: http://example.com, langCode: ga) - translationLanguage (langCode: en) - translationLanguage (langCode: de) - translationLanguage (langCode: cs)
